Package util.spring.io

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LociResourceLoader
    Extends ResourceLoader to cater for a resource that may be available from multiple locations (loci).
    ResourceReader<T>
    Converts resource data into instances of T.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FifoResource<T>
    Converts resource data into objects using a "first-available" strategy to determine from which location to load resource data with an option to fall back to a predefined stream of objects if no resource data can be fetched from the specified resource locations.
    FifoResourceLoaderAdapter
    Uses a given ResourceLoader to implement a "first-available" strategy to determine from which location to load a resource.
    ResourceLocation
    A Spring resource location.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ResourceReadException
    Signals that a resource could not be read into an object because of some I/O or data conversion error.
